RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONTPELIER RACE 2 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Handicap Purse 25000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH ARE RATED 110 OR LOWER. The highest weighted horse will be assigned 158 lbs. with all other weights adjusted accordingly based on the current ratings. Minimum weights 140 lbs., not includi ng apprentice allowances.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POTUS assumed command after the 1st hurdle, increased the lead after the 9th hurdle, entered the stretch with FRONTLINE CITIZEN challenging for the lead, then won handily after FRONTLINE CITIZEN lost his rider. WITHOUTDESTINATION (GB) settled midfield after the 2nd hurdle, made a bid 2nd hurdle from home, but was unable to gain ground on the leader. SEISMIC WAVE ran in the middle of the pack the entire race and never challenged the leaders. OSCAR WINNER remained toward the rear the entire race and was never a threat. VINCENT VAN GOGO rated early, attempted to gain on the outside after the first circuit but gave way to finish last. FRONTLINE CITIZEN (IRE) kept pace with the leader, entered the stretch alongside of POTUS to challenge for the lead, then lost his rider. THE STEWARDS CONDUCTED AN INQUIRY INTO THE FALL OF THE RIDER OF FRONTLINE CITIZEN AT THE TIME HE WAS SIDE-BY-SIDE WITH POTUS AND IN CONTENTION OF WINNING. THE JOCKEY OF FRONTLINE CITIZEN LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINT THE JOCKEY OF POTUS FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AS THE CAUSE OF THE FALL. FOLLOWING THE STEWARDS' REVIEW, THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND THERE WAS NO CHANGE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Oscar Winner
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated entire race, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Potus
ENTRY.COMMENT: assumed command after first,

ENTRY.NAME: Frontline Citizen (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: kept pace with leader, lost rider

ENTRY.NAME: Withoutdestination (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled midfield, bid 2nd from home

ENTRY.NAME: Seismic Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran midpack entire race, never challenged leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Vincent Van Gogo
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, midrace bid, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONTPELIER RACE 3 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Maiden Claiming Purse 20000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three-year-olds, 144 lbs.; four-year-olds, 152 lbs.; older, 156 lbs. Claiming price $15,000. For each $2,500 to $10,000, allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICANDOTHAT assumed the lead after the 1st hurdle, increased the lead after the first circuit, and drew off in the stretch as the clear winner. ABSAM rated early, moved to contention after the first circuit, moved to the inside after the 9th hurdle to gain position and was second best. BLESS BLESS started out the back, gained ground after 1 mile, bid after the 8th hurdle, gained ground on ABSAM in the stretch to just miss place position. ALL ROSES started middle of the pack, settled, and failed to menace. GRUNION contended early, kept pace with the leader through the 7th hurdle, began losing ground at the 8th hurdle, and was eased home. ROYAL REGATTA started middle of the pack, gained position at one mile, then lost ground, tired, pulled up before the 9th hurdle, and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Regatta
ENTRY.COMMENT: started midpack, gained position, lost ground, tired, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Icandothat
ENTRY.COMMENT: assumed lead after 1st hurdle, did not relinquish

ENTRY.NAME: Absam
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, moved to contention after first circuit, second best

ENTRY.NAME: All Roses
ENTRY.COMMENT: started midpack, settled, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Bless Bless
ENTRY.COMMENT: started out the back, gained ground after 1 mile, bid after 8th

ENTRY.NAME: Grunion
ENTRY.COMMENT: contended early, kept pace thru 7th hurdle, lost ground at 8th

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONTPELIER RACE 4 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Maiden Claiming Purse 20000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three-year-olds, 144 lbs.; four-year-olds, 152 lbs.; older, 156 lbs. Claiming price $15,000. For each $2,500 to $10,000, allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTOTUM started toward the back of the field and ran evenly, gained ground after the 9th hurdle, entered the stretch in the lead, was challenged by SLEIGHT OF HAND, and prevailed. SLEIGHT OF HAND started middle of the pack, ran evenly through 2 miles, gained ground to take the last hurdle in tandem with FACTOTUM and ICE BAR, went to the outside of FACTOTUM entering the stretch, and just missed. ICE BAR assumed an early lead, dueled with KENYA ROAD, lost ground after the 9th hurdle, and had no stretch rally. KENYA ROAD dueled with ICE BAR through 8 hurdles, led between calls, lost ground after the 8th hurdle, and was eased home. SIR LENNY showed no speed throughout the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Sleight of Hand
ENTRY.COMMENT: started midpack, ran evenly, stretch battle, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Lenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed no speed throughout race

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Bar
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, dueled with KENYA ROAD, lost ground after 8th

ENTRY.NAME: Factotum
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, gained going to the 9th, stretch battle, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Kenya Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled through 8 hurdles, lost ground, eased home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONTPELIER RACE 5 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 142 lbs.; Four Year Olds, 150 lbs.; Older, 154 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASAMO stalked the pace early, dueled with SLIABH AUGHTY (FR) to lead between calls, eased off the pace after the 8th hurdle, then gained ground after the final hurdle, went to the inside in the stretch, and passed rivals for the win. SAMUI SUNSET started middle of the pack and ran evenly, made a late gain after the final hurdle, entered the stretch wide, navigated around a fallen rider, and battled HIGH DEFF (FR) for place. HIGH DEFF (FR) started just off the pace, ran evenly through the first mile, gained ground going to the 8th hurdle, briefly held the lead only to lose ground after the 9th hurdle, and was unable to pass rivals in the stretch. I CAN ONLY IMAGINE (IRE) started in the back of the field, gained ground after the 8th hurdle, entered the stretch in contention, then tripped and fell over the lost rider of EVIE'S PRINCE. EVIE'S PRINCE started in the back of the field, began gaining ground after the first mile, moved to the lead after the 8th hurdle, entered the stretch in contention, but the rider fell in the stretch. SLIABH AUGHTY (FR) dueled CASAMO for the lead in the first mile, lost ground before the 8th hurdle, tired, and pulled up two hurdles from home and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Evie's Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: started in back, led after the 8th, lost rider in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: I Can Only Imagine (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: started in back, gain after 8th, fell over lost rider

ENTRY.NAME: High Deff (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran evenly, gained, unable to sustain, outrun in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sliabh Aughty (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead first mile, lost ground, tired and pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Samui Sunset
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack, late gain, battle for place

ENTRY.NAME: Casamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, eased after 8th, gained ground, stretch win

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Marion Dupont Scott Memorial S. MONTPELIER RACE 6 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 50000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES FOR FILLIES AND MARES, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. All weights adjusted accordingly based on current ratings.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIGHT TEMPO (FR) kept pace in the back through 8 hurdles in a tight field, gained ground after the 8th hurdle, entered the stretch in contention, and passed the nearest rival for the win. BERCASA (IRE) kept pace for the first mile, gained position before the 8th hurdle, assumed the lead before the final hurdle, and was outrun in stretch. AFRAID NOT kept pace early, lost ground before the 8th hurdle, and had no stretch rally. SAY GOODBYE (IRE) assumed an early lead, set the pace until the 9th hurdle, lost ground before the final hurdle, and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Bercasa (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: kept pace first mile, gained position, outrun in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Say Goodbye (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: assumed an early lead, set pace until 9th hurdle, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Right Tempo (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Potter Group USA LLC and Ashwell Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved through 8 hurdles, gained, stretch win

ENTRY.NAME: Afraid Not
ENTRY.COMMENT: kept pace early, lost ground before the 8th, no stretch rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Noel Laing S. MONTPELIER RACE 7 2 1/2M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 75000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES For Four Year Olds and Upward.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZABEEL CHAMPION (GB) started at a reserved pace, gained ground after the first mile, stalked the leader, entered the stretch in the lead and prevailed. SCORPION'S REVENGE (IRE) ran in back of the field for the first mile, gained position after the 7th fence, entered the stretch in contention, and was outrun. PROVEN INNOCENT ran evenly, gained ground 2nd fence from home, but had no stretch rally. MORTLACH (GB) settled middle of the pack, ran evenly, and was no threat. EYE OF GUNFIGHTER led from the start until 1/2 mile from home, faded, and had no rally. SOVIET PIMPERNEL (IRE) kept pace with the leader early, faded after the first mile, and was no threat. GORDON'S JET (IRE) lost his rider on the first fence.

ENTRY.NAME: Mortlach (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled midpack no rally, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Soviet Pimpernel (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: kept pace early, faded after 1 mile, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Gordon's Jet (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost rider on first fence

ENTRY.NAME: Scorpion's Revenge (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: Rran in back the first mile, gained position after 7th, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Zabeel Champion (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Tedham Martin and Wasdell Properties Ltd
ENTRY.COMMENT: started reserved pace, gained, stalked, led into stretch to win

ENTRY.NAME: Proven Innocent
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran evenly, gained 2nd from home, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Eye of Gunfighter
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickory Made Stables and Celtic Venture Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: led from start, faded after 2 miles, no rally
